column.name: content
column.value:
Category Added

A new category has been added to @@@import:directory@@@.

@@@Name@@@

@@@Summary@@@

@@@Content@@@

column.name: htmlheader
column.value:
<style type="text/css">

TD.directorytoptable{
	width: 33%;
	padding: 10px;
        vertical-align: top;
	}
H3 {
	margin: 2px;
	}

</style>

column.name: htmlheader
column.value:
<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css"
href="/webadmin/webeditor/webeditor.css" />
<script src="/webadmin/webeditor/webeditor.js"></script>
<style type="text/css">

form.directory{
	margin-bottom: 1em;
	}
	
fieldset.directory{
        margin: 10px 10px 0px 0px;
	padding: 10px 0px 10px 5px;
	border: 1px solid #666666;
	width: 480px;
	}
	
legend.directory{
	padding: 0 10px;
	text-transform: uppercase;
	font-size: 1.0em;
}

.directoryrow{
	clear: both;
	padding-top: 5px;
        margin: 0 10px;
	}

.directoryLabel{
	line-height: 1.6em;
	text-align: right;
	margin-right: 10px;
	width: 100px;
	float: left;
}
input.formField{
	float: left;
	width: 340px;
	}
	
textarea.directoryfield{
        float: left;
	font-size: 1em;
	width: 340px;
	}

input.formField,textarea.directoryfield{
	border: 1px solid #666666;
	padding: 2px;
	font-family: Arial,sans-serif;
        }

.directorysubmitButton{
	font-weight: bold;
	font-family: Arial,sans-serif;
	padding: 4px 6px;
	margin-right: 5px;
	width: auto;
	}	

.clearfix:after {
        content: ".";
        font-size: 0; 
        display: block; 
        height: 0; 
        clear: both; 
        visibility: hidden;
        }

.clearfix {
        display: inline-block;
        }

/* Hides from IE-mac \*/
        * html .clearfix {height: 1%;}
        .clearfix {display: block;}
/* End hide from IE-mac */

.fn {
	font-weight: bold;
        }

</style>

column.name: content
column.value:
Add Sub-Category under @@@include:database=@@@import:directory@@@:id=###record###:Name@@@

Fill in the form and press the Add button.

Your New Category

column.name: content
column.value:
Add Top Level Category

Fill in the form and press the Add button.

Your New Top Level Category

column.name: col2
column.value: Electronics consists of Mobile Phones, Television and Video.

column.name: col3
column.value: Electronics consists of Mobile Phones, Television and Video. The electronics business is focused on innovation and growth.

column.name: col2
column.value: The mobile phones business is focused on great usability.

column.name: col3
column.value: The mobile phones business is focused on great usability and development of add-on services.

column.name: col2
column.value: The television business is directed towards new technologies.

column.name: col3
column.value: The television business is directed towards new technologies. We are aiming to deliver state-of-the-art flatscreens.

column.name: col2
column.value: The games division supplies technology for various aspects of gaming.

column.name: col3
column.value: The games division supplies technology for various aspects of gaming utilising new opportunities arising all the time.

column.name: col2
column.value: The software department in the games

column.name: col3
column.value: The software department in the games division develops and distributes first-class games.

column.name: col2
column.value: Network Services aims to deliver interactive gaming services over the internet.

column.name: col3
column.value: Network Services aims to deliver interactive gaming services over the internet via subscription-based services.
